title: I cant't see Taric's ult
body: I can't see Taric's ult. Taric is too flashy and shiny, and this lights just confuses me - where ult, where shield, where heal. Is there way to make him clear and understandable?

replies.body: We are actually working on a system that will make Champions health bars outlined in yellow/gold when they are invulnerable. You can see this in the Ryze Champion spotlight. This should be out pretty soon and will go a long way to helping Tarics Ult and other Ults (like Kayle for example) easier to read.
Thanks! This will be really nice!
Sweet. I love improvements like this.

> Is there way to make him clear and understandable?

I personally think that each of his abilities has got its own distinctive VFX (while of course remaining cohesive with the rest)- Basically:

**Q-** Green with Targonian/celestial marks, as well as a gem above Taric's head.

**W-** A crystalline "bubble" for a shield.

E- Well, the shape here and the little gems in it is what makes this spell visually distinct and clear, for the most part at least.

**Ultimate-** A combination of a _dark blue_ circle with mystical sprinkles and and a beam of light (and I'm talking about before the Invulnerability takes place).
